name: Battle Ships
description:
Two players, two grids, few ships, take turns in defeating an opponent. It's really simple, try it with friend :)

This game was made with Unity + Blender by two guys, models, animations and music/sounds were made by my friend Abrakus and rest of the stuff (including server code) was made by me. It took us about 2 months (if I count time spent making own launcher with updates because I totally forgot there are sites like itch, thanks God there is!) but I do work full time, so it wasn't all just making this game, but I really enjoyed making it!

Give it a try, it's free, and it doesn't bite :)

If you find any bugs, please write them down in the comments, thank you!
